'''Teardrop Crystals''' are Quest Items that can be obtained by completing the Archon Quests [[Fallen Tears]], [[Hidden Tears]], and [[Stolen Tears]].

After being purified, they are used to [[Completely Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel|completely repair]] the [[Partially Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel]] during the Archon Quest [[Crystal Tears]].
